actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Postal Service.

official_title: To designate the United States Post Office building located at 508 S. Burleson, McCamey, Texas, as the "Claude W. Brown Post Office Building".

summary.text: Designates the United States Post Office building located at 508 S. Burleson, McCamey, Texas, as the Claude W. Brown Post Office Building.

titles.title: To designate the United States Post Office building located at 508 S. Burleson, McCamey, Texas, as the "Claude W. Brown Post Office Building".
